trans-unit.source: Custom settings description of Azure AD Connect connected directories.
trans-unit.target: Custom settings description of Azure AD Connect connected directories.

trans-unit.source: Connect your directories with Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target: Connect your directories with Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source: For Custom Settings, an enterprise administrator account is not required to connect to your Active Directory forests.
trans-unit.target: For Custom Settings, an enterprise administrator account is not required to connect to your Active Directory forests.

trans-unit.source: The wizard will accept a domain or local user account.
trans-unit.target: The wizard will accept a domain or local user account.

trans-unit.source: However, the account is used as the local AD Connector account, that is, it is the account that reads and writes the directory information for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: However, the account is used as the local AD Connector account, that is, it is the account that reads and writes the directory information for synchronization.

trans-unit.source: This means you will need to assign additional permissions to enable the following scenarios:
trans-unit.target: This means you will need to assign additional permissions to enable the following scenarios:

trans-unit.source: See [Office 365 Exchange Hybrid AAD Sync write-back attributes and permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn757602.aspx#exchange).
trans-unit.target: See [Office 365 Exchange Hybrid AAD Sync write-back attributes and permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn757602.aspx#exchange).

trans-unit.source: Write permissions to the directory objects and attributes that you wish to 'write-back'
trans-unit.target: Write permissions to the directory objects and attributes that you wish to 'write-back'

trans-unit.source: Domain admin permissions in the domain in which your federated servers are located.
trans-unit.target: Domain admin permissions in the domain in which your federated servers are located.

trans-unit.source: More on Azure AD Connect accounts and permissions
trans-unit.target: More on Azure AD Connect accounts and permissions
